messages.title: A Record of Action
messages.content:
When in Government, the Liberal Democrats delivered the following:
- Gave 26m people a £825 tax cut by raising the starting point for income tax to £10,500.
- Mapped out the Government’s path on renewable energy to 2050 including alternative low carbon energy.
- Phased out compulsory retirement age
- Improved online security for everyone with new laws that protect from identity theft.
- Improved financial efficiency for the low income families, to give every child an opportunity.
- End the detention of children for immigration purposes
- Cut income tax from 28% to 18% for higher tax payers.
- Removed innocent people’s DNA from police databases
- Created the Green Investment bank for larger infrastructure projects.
- Provided £400m for respite breaks for carers working more than 50 hours per week.
- Introduced the ‘triple lock’ on pensions, to ensure they go up each year.
There is a longer list at www.wthhthellhavethelibdemsdone.com which includes references.
